mapper.select: select ifnull (( select a.no from chat a join (select d.no from chat d join chat_member e on d.no = e.chat_no where e.user_no = #{userNo}) b on a.no = b.no join (select f.no from tikitaka.chat f join tikitaka.chat_member g on f.no = g.chat_no where g.user_no = #{authNo}) c on c.no = b.no where a.type = #{type}) , '0');
SELECT a.important important, a.no, a.title title, a.contents contents, b.name name, a.reg_date FROM notice a, user b WHERE a.user_no = b.no AND a.chat_no = #{chatNo};
select * from chat where no IN(select chat_no from chat_member where user_no = #{userNo});
